00013  * Clase engarda de validar que los datos de conexión facilitados son correctos
00014  * además de definir si el plugin requiere de validación remota o local (oauth)
00015  */
00016 class Plugins_Linkedin_Auth extends Common_Auth
00017 {
00018     private $_data;
00019     private $_config;
00020 
00021     /**
00022      * @return unknown_type
00023      */
00024     function __construct()
00025     {
00026         // Call the Model constructor
00027         parent::__construct();
00028 
00029         $this->_ci->config->load('apikeys', TRUE);
00030         $this->_config = $this->_ci->config->item('linkedin', 'apikeys');
00031     }
00032 
00033     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00034      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#hasRemoteAuth()
00035      */
00036     public function hasRemoteAuth()
00037     {
00038         return true;
00039     }
00040 
00041     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00042      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#remoteAuth()
00043      */
00044     public function remoteAuth()
00045     {
00046         $options = array(
00047             'version' => '1.0',
00048             'localUrl' => site_url("app/testing"),
00049             'callbackUrl' => site_url('accounts/auth'),
00050             'requestTokenUrl' => 'https://api.linkedin.com/uas/oauth/requestToken',
00051             'userAuthorizationUrl' => 'https://api.linkedin.com/uas/oauth/authorize',
00052             'accessTokenUrl' => 'https://api.linkedin.com/uas/oauth/accessToken',
00053             'consumerKey' => $this->_config["key"],
00054             'consumerSecret' => $this->_config["secret"],
00055         );
00056 
00057         $consumer = new Zend_Oauth_Consumer($options);
00058 
00059         //fetch a request token
00060         $token = $consumer->getRequestToken();
00061 
00062         //persist the token to storage
00063         if (session_id() == "") {
00064             session_start();
00065         }
00066 
00067         $_SESSION['LINKEDIN_REQUEST_TOKEN'] = serialize($token);
00068 
00069         //redirect the user
00070         $consumer->redirect();
00071     }
00072 
00073     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00074      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#setData($data)
00075      */
00076     public function setData($data)
00077     {
00078          $this->_data = $data;
00079     }
00080 
00081     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00082      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#getData()
00083      */
00084     public function getData()
00085     {
00086         return $this->_data;
00087     }
00088 
00089     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00090      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#validate()
00091      */
00092     public function validate()
00093     {
00094         
00095         if (!isset($this->_data["oauth_token"])) {
00096 
00097             return "Acceso denegado";
00098         }
00099 
00100         if (session_id() == "") {
00101             session_start();
00102         }
00103 
00104         $options = array(
00105             'version' => '1.0',
00106             'localUrl' => site_url("app/testing"),
00107             'callbackUrl' => site_url('accounts/auth'),
00108             'requestTokenUrl' => 'https://api.linkedin.com/uas/oauth/requestToken',
00109             'userAuthorizationUrl' => 'https://api.linkedin.com/uas/oauth/authorize',
00110             'accessTokenUrl' => 'https://api.linkedin.com/uas/oauth/accessToken',
00111             'consumerKey' => $this->_config["key"],
00112             'consumerSecret' => $this->_config["secret"],
00113         );
00114 
00115         $consumer = new Zend_Oauth_Consumer($options);
00116 
00117         $token = $consumer->getAccessToken($this->_data, unserialize($_SESSION['LINKEDIN_REQUEST_TOKEN']));
00118         unset($_SESSION['LINKEDIN_REQUEST_TOKEN']);
00119 
00120         $this->_data = serialize($token);
00121         return true;
00122     }
00123 }
